segments.text: Thank you for showing me your offices , Mr . Becker . I can see why Washington bureaucrats enjoy their jobs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The city is beautiful , the off ... , the offices are modern and comfortable , and the work is so interesting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Many people work for the federal government their entire adult lives . Government service can be a rewarding and secure career .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , many positions pay salaries that are comparable to those in private industries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ Ve always thought that most bureaucrats are lazy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes that ’ s true , but not usually . Most feds are honest , hard-working professionals . It ’ s hard to keep highly trained people , so the pay and working conditions have to be attractive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m a GS - 15 . That ’ s high on the scale of workers , but even a GS - 1 is paid a living wage .
segments.speaker: S2
